title: Finding Your Rest and Hope in Christ
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Meg Meeker
itunes:summary: Parenting is taxing on you as a mom. That's why it's essential to make time for rest. John and Danny give some encouragement to tired mothers. Receive the book The 10 Habits of Happy Mothers with your gift of any amount!
description: Parenting is taxing on you as a mom. That's why it's essential to make time for rest. John and Danny give some encouragement to tired mothers. Receive the book The 10 Habits of Happy Mothers with your gift of any amount!
